content.description: Throws a bouncing projectiles. Cooldown reduces when moving.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Very rarely appears after unlocking **O'Sole Meeo**

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Effect Duration +1s 
(3) Speed +30% 
(4) Damage +5 
(5) Speed +30% 
(6) Projectiles +1 
(7) Speed +30% 
(8) Defeated enemies might drop hearts.

content.title: Celestial Dusting
